title: SWOS
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-2, Local Multiplayer 1-2, HD (High Definition). Sensible World of Soccer is the classic 90’s football game reborn with enhanced graphics! Take on your friends online now in this fantastic pick up and play football game. Play a quick game, or manage your team over a full season with a fully immersive tactics editor.This game uses technology of Massive Incorporated ("Massive") that enables in-game advertising. Massive may collect your Internet protocol address and other anonymous information for the purposes of transmitting and measuring in-game advertising. Massive does not store or use this information for discovering your identity. Please see Massive's privacy policy: http://www.massiveincorporated.com/site_network/privacy.htm. Trademarks and copyrighted material in in-game advertising are the property of the respective owners. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Sensible World of Soccer Picture Pack
childDownloads.description: Gamer picture pack containing ten unique images for use in your gamertag, created by the original Sensible World of Soccer designer. There are no refunds for this item. For more information see www.xbox.com/live/accounts

childDownloads.title: Sensible World of Soccer Theme
childDownloads.description: Theme for Sensible World of Soccer featuring unique art work by the original Sensible World of Soccer graphics designer. There are no refunds for this item. For more information see, www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Sensible World of Soccer Trailer (HD)
childDownloads.description: Get a sneak preview of Sensible World of Soccer now in this great video.
